Uses of Package
com.adobe.fd.signatures.client.types

  • Packages that use com.adobe.fd.signatures.client.types 
    Package Description
    com.adobe.fd.docassurance.client.api
    Defines package version.
    com.adobe.fd.signatures.client.types
    Defines package version.
    com.adobe.fd.signatures.pdf.inputs
    Defines package version.
  • Classes in com.adobe.fd.signatures.client.types used by com.adobe.fd.docassurance.client.api 
    Class and Description
    FieldMDPOptionSpec
    The options that are set for the signature field lock dictionary associated with a given signature field.
    MDPPermissions
    Represents the permissions that can be performed on a PDF document without invalidating the signature.
    PDFDocumentVerificationInfo
    Represents the validation information of all signatures located in a PDF document and its overall status.
    PDFSeedValueOptionSpec
    Represents the seed value dictionary that is associated with a signature field.
    PDFSignature
    The PDFSignature class contains information about the filter and subfilters that are used for validating the signature embedded in a signed or certified PDF document.
    PDFSignatureField
    Provides information about signature fields located within a PDF document.
    PDFSignatureFieldProperties
    This class provides information about PDFSeedValueOptionSpec and FieldMDPOptionSpec objects of the signature field located within a PDF document.
    PDFSignatureVerificationInfo
    Contains the validity content of a signed or certified signature field.
    PositionRectangle
    Represents the position of a signature field located within a PDF document.
    VerificationTime
    Enumerations for various verification time settings.
  • Classes in com.adobe.fd.signatures.client.types used by com.adobe.fd.signatures.client.types 
    Class and Description
    CertificateInformation
    Provides information about a given certificate.
    CertificatePath
    Represents a certificate path and information about the path's validation status and the failure reason in case the path is not valid.
    CertificateSeedValueOptionSpec
    Represents a certificate seed value dictionary.
    FieldMDPAction
    An enumeration specifying the type of FieldMDP action associated with the FieldMDP dictionary of a given signature field.
    FieldMDPOptionSpec
    The options that are set for the signature field lock dictionary associated with a given signature field.
    IdentityDetails
    Represents the identity details that were extracted from the certificate.
    IdentityInformation
    Represents basic validation information of a specific identity certificate containing the path validation and its status.
    IdentityStatus
    Represents the identify status of the signer.
    MDPPermissions
    Represents the permissions that can be performed on a PDF document without invalidating the signature.
    PDFDocumentVerificationStatus
    An enumeration value that provides verification information.
    PDFFilterType
    Specifies supported filters that are used when validating a signature.
    PDFSeedValueOptionSpec
    Represents the seed value dictionary that is associated with a signature field.
    PDFSignatureFieldProperties
    This class provides information about PDFSeedValueOptionSpec and FieldMDPOptionSpec objects of the signature field located within a PDF document.
    PDFSignaturePermissions
    Represents actions that can be performed without invalidating the signature.
    PDFSignatureType
    Represents the type of signature field.
    PDFSignatureVerificationInfo
    Contains the validity content of a signed or certified signature field.
    PDFSigningType
    Represents the type of signature on signature field.
    PDFSubFilterType
    This class represents supported sub-filters.
    PDFTimeStampSeed
    Represents time-stamping options that can be set when modifying a signature field.
    RevocationInformation
    Contains information about revoked certificates.
    SignatureProperties
    Represents basic signature properties associated with a signed or certified PDF signature field.
    SignatureStatus
    Represents the various status values associated with a signature.
    SignatureType
    Represents the type of signature used to secure a document.
    SigningFormat 
    Timestamp
    Contains the timestamp related information
    VerificationTime
    Enumerations for various verification time settings.
